title: A Lush Engagement
description: The response to the Lush rockstar series has been so fantastic that I wanted to give everyone a little more of the Lush boys in between Books 2 and 3. Joss and Mel started it all in Book 1, A Lush Betrayal. So hereâ€™s how the rock god, and his gorgeous photojournalist, Mel, got engaged.
author: Selena Laurence
